titleStmt.title: The godly saiyngs of the old auncient faithful fathers vp on the Sacrament of the bodye and bloude of Chryste. Newlye compyled and translated oute of Latin intoo English. By Ihon Veron Senonoys.
titleStmt.author: Véron, John, d. 1563.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Ihon Oswen. They be also to sell at Shrewesburye,
publicationStmt.pubPlace: [Imprinted the .xi. day of October. Anno. Do. 1550. At worceter :

notesStmt.note: At end of colophon: Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
